attributes.action: stop using e-petitions if they are not to be recognised
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why have a e-petition section if it is not going to be taken seriously
why ask for votes to the petition when you the government are not interested if the results go the opposite way that you would like them to go
take for example the edinburgh poll on congestion charging ,
now how embarising was the result on that one, and how much did the whole exercise cost the taxpayer, but then at the end of the day the congestion carge for edinburgh will become a reality whether the public want it or not

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
